channel.title: Comments on: A Costa Rican adventure

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description: Hi Graham, thanks for your comment! I would suggest sending your photos through to magazines to see if they would publish them. Good luck :)
item.content:encoded: Hi Graham, thanks for your comment! I would suggest sending your photos through to magazines to see if they would publish them. Good luck ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Graham Abbott
item.dc:creator: Graham Abbott
item.description: Lovely Photos all round you have the job i have always wanted i have don many of the same adventures you have but never really sold any or even published any except on FB ,just wondering what i could do with them i have thought of a Picture lib or inflight magazines ,I don't expect you to replay but i heard you speak on radio show and checked out your blog its great ,Enjoy the adventures and look forward to seeing more beautiful photos :) Cheers Graham Abbott grahamabbottphoto@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Lovely Photos all round you have the job i have always wanted i have don many of the same adventures you have but never really sold any or even published any except on FB ,just wondering what i could do with them i have thought of a Picture lib or inflight magazines ,I don’t expect you to replay but i heard you speak on radio show and checked out your blog its great ,Enjoy the adventures and look forward to seeing more beautiful photos ðŸ™‚ Cheers Graham Abbott grahamabbottphoto@gmail.com
